post.desc:
One of Seiga's spell cards is [**Yǎng Xiǎoguǐ**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/List_of_Spell_Cards/Touhou_Project_2#:~:text=ヤンシャオグイ) – literally "Raise Little Demon". And yes, they're dead babies. You know, lucky charms and all that.

There is also an angle that these spirits chased after Reimu/Marisa/Sanae/Yōmu because since they're miscarried fetuses, they yearn to go back to the womb.
